N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 307.3 - Additional service

State Regulations

At campuses where balanced calendar operation has been
approved by the board of trustees, any academic year employee, subject to the
approval of the chancellor of State University, may be required or permitted to
render service in excess of such professional obligation. Such approval shall
be granted only in unusual circumstances where, in a two-year period, the needs
of the campus require professional service beyond the professional obligation
normally established for such period. Any academic year employee who performs
such additional approved service shall receive additional compensation at not
to exceed the following rates: (a) for
a fifth trimester in any two-year period, an additional one-half of base annual
salary; (b) for a seventh quarter
in any two-year period, an additional one-third of base annual
salary. Notes
